Mount the Data Domain device to NIM Server

## Set Data Domain File System ##

  1. Add the following lines to the /etc/filesystems 
     /data_domain:
        dev             = "/backup/mksysb_images"
        vfs             = nfs
        nodename        = itc9000
        mount           = true
        options         = bg,soft,intr,retrans=2,rsize=32768,wsize=32768,proto=tcp,sec=sys
        account         = false
  1. Now execute the following command to set upDdata Domain for mounting 
     /usr/sbin/nfso -o nfs_use_reserved_ports=1
  2. Mount the device 
     mount /data_domain
